I Am Shankar Bisht

I specialize in supply chain and purchase related works with the diverse experience of 15+ years.

View My Work

I Specialize In

Managing flow of goods and services and includes all processes that transforms raw materials into final products. It involves the active stremalining of a business's supply side activiies to maximize customer value and gain a competetive advantage in the marketplace.

Concepting

Profound knowledge of key activities and processes that must be completed in an efficient (fuel-conserving, cost-reducing. etc...) and timely manner.

Managing

Profound experience in setting the strategies for the company and coordinating the efforts of the employees to accomplish the objectives through the available resources.

Social Works

Love to work with the local government bodies and with the NGOs to serve the society in the best way possible.

Interaction

Highly interactive and engaging with the customers so as to draw out the better conclusion of what actually the customer needs.

My Creative Process

All of my activities are based on my professional work experience to get the result that i am looking for.

1

Discuss The Project

with the company employees and engineers for the better understanding of the project and needs of the customer.

2

Brainstorming ^ Concept

Collect the ideas of the team members spontaneoulsy so as to get the new ideas for better and efficient production.

3

Production Planning

Intensive planning so as to get prepared for the challenges that could come in the future and disturb the manufacturing.

4

Interaction

Highly interactive and engaging with the customers so as to draw out the better conclusion of what actually the customer needs.
